import React from 'react' import { Checkbox } from '@/components/checkBox' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio/index' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings/index' import './index.scss' import plusIcon from '../../../../../../assets/images/add.svg' class TabAndroid extends React.Component { state = { coupons: false, largeIcon: false, image: false, IconUrl: false, notificationSound: false, android: false, priority: 'high', additionalPairs: [ { key: '', value: '', canAddMore: true, }, ], } _addPairs = () => { const { additionalPairs } = this.state additionalPairs.push({ key: '', value: '', canAddMore: false, }) console.log(additionalPairs) this.setState({ additionalPairs: additionalPairs.map((part, index) => { if (index === additionalPairs.length - 1) { part.canAddMore = true } else { part.canAddMore = false } return part }), }) } _handlePairsInput = (index, key, value) => { const { additionalPairs } = this.state additionalPairs[index][key] = value this.setState({ additionalPairs }) } _removePairs = index => { const { additionalPairs } = this.state additionalPairs.splice(index, 1) this.setState({ additionalPairs }) } render() { const { coupons, largeIcon, image, notificationSound, android, priority, IconUrl, } = this.state return (
this.setState({ coupons: !coupons })} > Coupons {coupons && (
)}
this.setState({ largeIcon: !largeIcon })} > Large Icon {largeIcon && (
this.setState({ IconUrl: !IconUrl })}> Enter URL {IconUrl && ( <>
File supported: .mp3 and .m4a
)}
)}
this.setState({ image: !image })}> Image {image && (
)}
this.setState({ notificationSound: !notificationSound })} > Notification Sound {notificationSound && (
)}
this.setState({ android: !android })} > Android O {android && (
)}
Notification Priority * Default High Medium
Actions *
Choose what happens when user clicks the body of this push notification.
Additional Key Value pairs (Optional):
{this.state.additionalPairs.map((part, index) => (
this._handlePairsInput(index, 'key', e.currentTarget.value) } className="form-input mrgn-10" placeholder="key" /> this._handlePairsInput(index, 'value', e.currentTarget.value) } placeholder="value" /> {part.canAddMore ? (
) : (
this._removePairs(index)}> -
)}
))}
) } } export default TabAndroid
